description: Security Sector Reform and Small Arms activities to be funded by UNDP/BCPR and implemented within BINUB SSR-SA Section

subproject.description:
• Creation of 2 national databases maintained by the police and army to register and track SALWs in compliance with requirements defined in the Nairobi Protocol for the Prevention, Control and Reduction of Small Arms and Light Weapons in the Great Lakes Region and the Horn of Africa
• Establishment of a national ammunitions destruction site
• Establishment of a national facility to shred SALWs
• Rehabilitation of 5 FDN (army) and PNB (national police) armories in order to permit the safe and secure storage of arms stocks in conformity with OSCE recommendations
subproject.title: Small Arms JP - TRAC3 & Swiss

subproject.description:
• 14 rehabilitated military barracks
• Improved control of arms and munitions stocks

subproject.description: Recensement de la police nationale burundaise
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Police Census

subproject.description:
• Consolidated integration and improved discipline of PNB personnel
• Facilitated recognition of PNB personnel by the population
• Identification and the progressive removal from PNB personnel of arms not appropriate to their mission
• Improved image and credibility of the PNB amongst the population
• Improved daily management of national state security
• Increased PNB discipline and respect for human rights through strengthened monitoring mechanisms of PNB personnel
• Improved transparency of internal PNB management
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: CD - Burundi National Police

subproject.description:
• Shared understanding of the role and responsibilities of the SNR within the peace process and in the context of institutional democratization
• Strengthened parliamentary control of the National Intelligence Service
• SNR administrative staff and intelligence personnel carry out their functions in strict respect of the rule of law and human rights
subproject.title: CD - Ntl Intelligence Service

subproject.description:
• Reinforced military command through ‘training of trainers’ as well as trainings in military leadership
• Sustainable competencies accrued through the provision of pedagogical tools
